They serve as mentors, teaching research methodologies, guiding book selections, and ensuring the library is a welcoming and vibrant place, promoting intellectual curiosity.

In conclusion, although your reasoning highlights some ways that schools can adapt to changes in technology and resource availability, I believe that the unique contributions and expertise provided by librarians continue to play an irreplaceable role in the educational landscape.
